question: 県
sourceMnemonic: Attach this word onto the end of a prefecture place name and you have the <kanji>prefecture</kanji> portion of _____ <vocabulary>prefecture</vocabulary>. These are a lot like states or provinces.
sourceReadingMnemonic: The reading for this is the same as what you learned with the kanji, probably because it's always attached to things (so it's like jukugo). Don't write the <ja>〜</ja> when you're writing in the answer, just the <ja>けん</ja> portion, and you'll get this one correct.
